name: Red C London
description:
Red C is an award-winning mobile app development agency based in the heart of Tech City, Shoreditch. We take the time to carry out detailed user research in order to implement innovative design and code outstanding custom-made mobile apps that streamline business processes. 
 
Our consultative approach provides impartial, strategic advice that aims to enhance and grow your business with a digital solution.
Our team are fanatical about crafting crisp, cutting-edge graphics and creating a seamless user experience shaped around your customers.
Our expertise stretch from iOS, Android, and Windows, through to integrating backend databases, intuitive Content Management Systems and web service connections.
We understand that apps are the future of business, therefore, we offer an extensive range of bespoke services to optimise the internal running of your company. Our team are dedicated saving your company copious amounts of time and money by simplifying everyday tasks in the workplace. 
Whether you wish to mobilise your internal procedures, develop an entrepreneurial idea, motivate your employees or simply raise the profile of your brand - get in touch today!
